on_change_size <- function(before, options, envir) {
    if (before)
        return(paste(options$change_size))
}

knitr::knit_hooks$set(change_size = on_change_size)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(prompt = TRUE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      dev.args=list(pointsize=17),
                      change_size='\\small')
set.seed(551991)
